You can also pre-order at Telltale's website and get a 25% off coupon for another TT game.

item.title: New Telltale Game starring many popular icons
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
Explaining how to play poker is no fun, just a game where you have to press a button to do whatever it is you have to do to be able to win, it’s fine. And it has heavy, which is a bonus.

Read full topic

real…people? DOES NOT COMPUTE

item.dc:creator: Door

item.source: New Telltale Game starring many popular icons

item.title: New Telltale Game starring many popular icons
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Their previous poker game sold mostly on the merit of its good characters and jokes. Plus, they actually respond to attempts to bluff your way out of a hand, which is pretty interesting. Besides, poker can be more fun than you think when you give it a shot. I’ve been playing way too much of this Dice Poker game in The Witcher.

Read full topic
